name: Chaos
detailed_description:
Adventure | Survival | Intrigue

Prepare for an other-worldly experience as you face unique environments and mysterious alien technology in CHAOS! You play as the Alien Destaro a member of the Onyeho race who exist on a planet where crime and war is rampant. Destaro and Uttarha are brothers who work out a plan to escape their war ridden home to a nearby habitable world in the same binary star system. The rocket YOU are on crashes upon entry to this new world. With the rocket crashed, and all navigation equipment broken, you call Uttarha on a radio only to hear that his rocket also crashes before going silent. What could have caused both of you to crash here? Along your adventure to find your brother, you will figure out WHY you both crashed. You will also encounter many unique forms of aggressive alien life along the way. Once you find out "why you crashed" you will be one step closer to solving the mysteries of the planet. But where is your brother?



Features-
Full story campaign mode
For PC and XBOX ONE
Full controller support
Open World- no loading screens
Opening cinematic
Full multiplayer lobby system online and LAN
All custom textures and 10 custom alien creatures all with different abilities
3d directional sound affects
Custom soundtrack by Vic Freeman

short_description: Prepare for an other-worldly experience as you face unique environments and mysterious alien technology in CHAOS! You play as the alien Destaro who leaves his corrupt home planet with his brother to a new world, but things turn to chaos when both of you crash upon entry.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz, AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 2gb graphics memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Some high end integrated GPU's may work on lower settings but are not suggested for an optimal experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3,4 GHz, AMD CPU AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD RX580 for ultra high 1080p recommended
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: windows compatible soundcard
